content: basic pineapple motif by martee gauge is unimportant for this pattern choose your hook size based on yarn weight & preference the sample shown is done with bernat cool crochet 3 and a 4 45mm g hook and measures approx 5 5 square shell pattern 2dc chain 1 2dc in same stitch or chain-1 space of shell below abbreviations used chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet
